full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### **Notice: Annual Grounds Maintenance**

**Notice Type: Request for Proposal**
**Solicitation Number: WS4324156461**

**Procurement Category: SRV**
**Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18145308?extsite=MjgxNDUzMDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==**

**Background:**

As part of the ongoing efforts to provide superior public services, the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the provision of Snow Removal and Landscape Maintenance services at the Salaberry Armoury, located at 188 Boulevard Alexandre-Taché, Gatineau, QC, J9A 1L8 and 455 Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC, J8Y 6V7.

**Bid Requirements:**

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by **January 19, 2024 at 2:00pm EST**. Late submissions will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Bidders must visit the designated work sites as part of the site visit on **December 20th, 2023**, starting at **11:00am EST**. Arrangements have been made for the site visit. To confirm attendance, Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority by **December 13, 2023 at 2:00pm EST**.

**Expected Contract Details:**

- **Contract Start Date:** **May 1, 2024**
- **Contract Scope:** Snow Removal and Landscape Maintenance services, including labor, materials, equipment, supervision, and transportation.
- **Location:** Salaberry Armoury, 188 Boulevard Alexandre-Taché, Gatineau, QC, J9A 1L8 and 455 Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC, J8Y 6V7.

**Procurement Method:**

- **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).
- **Procurement Category:** Services Related to Maintenance and Repair.
- **Award Criteria:** Lowest Price.

Note:
- A site visit is mandatory as part of the bid process
